T02TD1998E:196b-1: shr'i badzra bhee ra ba s'a dha nam no piksha /
T02TD1998E:196b-3: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs /
T02TD1998E:196b-4: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1998E:196b-5: gzugs mchog rab tu drag po che //
T02TD1998E:196b-6: dpa' bo mchog gi spyod yul can //
T02TD1998E:196b-7: gdul dka' 'dul ba'i don mdzad pa //
T02TD1998E:196b-9: sgrub pa'i thabs ni yang dag par //
T02TD1998E:196b-10: bdag gis nges par brjod par bya //
T02TD1998E:196b-11: rtogs dga'i rgyud rtog la btud nas //
T02TD1998E:196b-13: phun sum tshogs sogs mtshan nyid can //
T02TD1998E:196b-14: bla ma dang po mnyes par bya //
T02TD1998E:196b-15: rdo rje 'jigs byed mchog gi don //
T02TD1998E:196b-16: thams cad slob mar de bzhin te //
T02TD1998E:196b-17: dus kun du ni snying rje ba //
T02TD1998E:196b-18: lus can kun la bsgom par bya //
T02TD1998E:196b-19: sngags pas thog mar langs nas ni //
T02TD1998E:196b-20: ci bde bar ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1998E:196b-21: dang po dur khrod chu 'gram mam //
T02TD1998E:196b-22: shing gcig gam ni mtshan gcig gnas //
T02TD1998E:196b-23: bzhi mdo 'am ni ri bo yi //
T02TD1998E:196b-24: rtse mo dang ni khang stong gnas //
T02TD1998E:196b-25: ma mo'i khyim mam yang thog mdzes //
T02TD1998E:196b-26: lha yi khang pa dag tu dang //
T02TD1998E:196b-27: 'thab mo'i sa dang grong khyer stong //
T02TD1998E:196b-28: yid du 'ong ba'i grong dag tu //
T02TD1998E:196b-30: thang ka la sogs gzugs gzhan bsgom //
T02TD1998E:196b-31: mchod dang bdud rtsi la sogs kyis //
T02TD1998E:197a-2: sha rnams kun gyi gtor ma ni //
T02TD1998E:197a-4: dang por lha la bzod par gsol //
T02TD1998E:197a-5: zhing skyong la sogs thams cad gshegs //
T02TD1998E:197a-6: snying gar zla ba nyi dkyil gnas //
T02TD1998E:197a-7: yi ge h'um ni 'bar ba'i mchog / de la 'od kyi phreng 'phro bas //
T02TD1998E:197a-8: 'jigs byed la sogs bkug nas ni //
T02TD1998E:197a-9: lha rnams lag na thogs pa yi //
T02TD1998E:197a-10: mchod pa rnams kyis legs par mchod //
T02TD1998E:197a-11: de yis bcom ldan 'das rnams dgyes //
T02TD1998E:197a-12: 'khor rnams la yang lhan cig dbul //
T02TD1998E:197a-13: sdig pa rnams ni bshags par bya //
T02TD1998E:197a-14: skyes shing byung ba rnams ni bsal //
T02TD1998E:197a-15: mi byed par ni spyan sngar brjod //
T02TD1998E:197a-16: de bzhin bsod nams rjes yi rang //
T02TD1998E:197a-17: bdag gis bde 'gro yongs su bsngo //
T02TD1998E:197a-18: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro //
T02TD1998E:197a-19: sems can thams cad bdag gis bsgral //
T02TD1998E:197a-20: byang chub gnas la dgod par bgyi //
T02TD1998E:197a-21: byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed //
T02TD1998E:197a-22: tshad med bzhi yi khang bzang lam //
T02TD1998E:197a-23: mchod pa bdun ni rab tu bya //
T02TD1998E:197a-24: gtso bo mkha' la bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD1998E:197a-25: lha dang chos rnams thams cad kun //
T02TD1998E:197a-26: bdag med par ni bsam par bya //
T02TD1998E:197a-27: dang por sngags 'di brjod pa yis //
T02TD1998E:197a-28: de bzhin bdag med dran par bya //
T02TD1998E:197a-29: aom sva bh'a wa shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bha wa shuddho& ham /
T02TD1998E:197a-30: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1998E:197a-31: 'di yis chos rnams thams cad dang //
T02TD1998E:197a-32: bdag nyid stong par rnam par bsam //
T02TD1998E:197a-33: sems can bla med bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1998E:197a-34: sngon gyi smon lam dran par bya //
T02TD1998E:197a-35: stong las yi ge yam du gyur //
T02TD1998E:197a-36: rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam //
T02TD1998E:197a-37: du ba'i mdog can rdo rje'i gdan //
T02TD1998E:197a-38: de dbus yi ge aa las zla //
T02TD1998E:197a-39: de yi steng du yi ge dh'i: //
T02TD1998E:197a-40: 'jam dpal gzhon nu yi ni gzugs //
T02TD1998E:197a-41: de yis snying gar rnam bsam pa //
T02TD1998E:197a-42: yi ge a'a: las nyi dkyil 'khor //
T02TD1998E:197a-43: bdag dang nyi ma gcig tu gyur //
T02TD1998E:197a-46: 'jam dpal gzugs ni bsam mi khyab //
T02TD1998E:197a-47: rdo rje ral gri g-yas na 'dzin //
T02TD1998E:197a-48: g-yon pa na ni sdigs mdzub kyang //
T02TD1998E:197a-49: bgegs dang bar chod yang dag gsod //
T02TD1998E:197b-0: slar @197b 'dus de yi dkyil du thim //
T02TD1998E:197b-1: slar yang 'od zer spros pa yis //
T02TD1998E:197b-2: phyogs bcu por ni yongs su gnas //
T02TD1998E:197b-3: de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub sems //
T02TD1998E:197b-4: rig pa 'dzin dang lha yi tshogs //
T02TD1998E:197b-5: khro bo la sogs de dag kun //
T02TD1998E:197b-6: slar 'dus nyi mar rnam par thim //
T02TD1998E:197b-7: de bzhin gshegs dang 'jam pa'i dpal //
T02TD1998E:197b-8: rig pa 'dzin dang lha yi tshogs //
T02TD1998E:197b-9: nyi mar gcig tu gyur par bsam //
T02TD1998E:197b-11: dpag tshad dag ni stong phrag brgyar //
T02TD1998E:197b-12: thams cad khyab par rab tu gnas //
T02TD1998E:197b-13: de yi dbus su gzhal yas bsam //
T02TD1998E:197b-14: zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1998E:197b-15: rta babs bzhi yis mdzes pa dang //
T02TD1998E:197b-16: ba dan dril bu la sogs dang //
T02TD1998E:197b-17: phreng ba la sogs rnams kyis spras //
T02TD1998E:197b-18: sgo khyud kyi ni phug dag tu //
T02TD1998E:197b-19: rdo rje rin chen sogs kyis spras //
T02TD1998E:197b-20: 'khor lo nyis brtsegs yang dag bsam //
T02TD1998E:197b-21: lnga bcur gcig gis ma tshad dag /
T02TD1998E:197b-22: padma zla ba yang dag gnas //
T02TD1998E:197b-23: de dag steng na nyi dkyil 'khor //
T02TD1998E:197b-24: thams cad mchog tu bsreg pa yi //
T02TD1998E:197b-26: de la rim pa bzhin du yang //
T02TD1998E:197b-27: lnga bcur gcig gis ma tshad ba'i //
T02TD1998E:197b-28: lha rnams de dkyil ro steng bsam //
T02TD1998E:197b-29: shar dang lho dang nub dang ni //
T02TD1998E:197b-30: byang dang dbus su go rims bzhin //
T02TD1998E:197b-31: mgo dang lag pa rgyu ma rkang //
T02TD1998E:197b-32: me sogs grva bzhi dag tu yang //
T02TD1998E:197b-33: de bzhin thod pa thod tshal pa //
T02TD1998E:197b-34: dur khrod kyi ni ras kyang gzhag / skyes bu gsal shing btsugs pa gzhag / de bzhin du yang phyag rgya'i ming //
T02TD1998E:197b-35: shar la sogs pa'i snam bu bzhir //
T02TD1998E:197b-36: gri dang mtshon ni rtse gcig dang //
T02TD1998E:197b-37: gtun shing dang ni chu gri dang //
T02TD1998E:197b-38: rtse gcig lcags kyu ma he dang //
T02TD1998E:197b-39: ba lang lhan cig shar du brgyad //
T02TD1998E:197b-40: sta re mda' dang dbyug to dang //
T02TD1998E:197b-41: kha tv'am 'khor lo de bzhin zhags //
T02TD1998E:197b-42: phag dang bong bu lho phyogs kyi //
T02TD1998E:197b-43: snam bu la ni rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1998E:197b-44: rdo rje chung dang ni phub ;
T02TD1998E:197b-45: / gzhu dang dril bu rlung gi ras //
T02TD1998E:197b-46: rnga mo khyi ni nub phyogs kyi //
T02TD1998E:197b-47: snam bu la ni de bzhin bri //
T02TD1998E:197b-48: sdigs mdzub dang ni 'phan rtse gsum //
T02TD1998E:197b-49: glang chen lpags dang tho ba dang //
T02TD1998E:197b-50: mdung dang me yi thab dang ni //
T02TD1998E:197b-51: lug dang spyang gi lhan cig brgyad //
T02TD1998E:197b-52: byang du rtag tu bsam par bya //
T02TD1998E:198a-2: shar gyi sgo ru bya rgod gzhag / lho yi sgo ru 'ug pa gzhag / nub tu bya rog seng ge yang //
T02TD1998E:198a-3: byang du rnam par bsam par bya //
T02TD1998E:198a-4: me grva khyung ni legs par gzhag / bden bral du ni khra gzhag go //
T02TD1998E:198a-5: rlung gi gnas su ri skegs te //
T02TD1998E:198a-6: dbang ldan du ni de bzhin bzhad //
T02TD1998E:198a-7: thams cad de bzhin rnam par dgod //
T02TD1998E:198a-8: zla ba'i gzugs su bsam par bya //
T02TD1998E:198a-9: dbus kyi zla bar yi ge dh'i: //
T02TD1998E:198a-11: gti mug brdzun dang chags phrag dog / shar sogs le'u tshe bzhi la'o //
T02TD1998E:198a-12: me yi grva sogs rnam bsam pa //
T02TD1998E:198a-13: sems ma rdo rje de bzhin du //
T02TD1998E:198a-14: rin chen rdor ma bsgom par bya //
T02TD1998E:198a-15: chos kyi rdor ma de bzhin te //
T02TD1998E:198a-16: las kyi rdor ma rnam bsam bya //
T02TD1998E:198a-17: rdo rje rnon po rdo ral gri //
T02TD1998E:198a-18: byams pa dang ni 'jam dpal gzhag / ye shes sku dang ngag dbang phyug / zla ba'i 'od dang ye shes mtsho //
T02TD1998E:198a-19: shar du brgyad po de dag gzhag / lho phyogs su ni gzhag bya ba //
T02TD1998E:198a-20: rdo rje sna tshogs rdor gnon sbyin //
T02TD1998E:198a-21: rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje chos //
T02TD1998E:198a-22: rdo rje srung ba rnon rdo rje //
T02TD1998E:198a-23: rdo rje rgyu dang dra ba'i 'od //
T02TD1998E:198a-24: nub phyogs de bzhin brgyad gzhag pa //
T02TD1998E:198a-25: rdo rje smra ba rdo rje sems //
T02TD1998E:198a-26: rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje chags //
T02TD1998E:198a-27: rdo rje legs dang rdor rin chen //
T02TD1998E:198a-28: nyi ma'i 'od dang rdor nyi ma //
T02TD1998E:198a-29: byang du yang ni brjod bya ba //
T02TD1998E:198a-30: rdo rje dpal dang rdo rje bzhad //
T02TD1998E:198a-31: spos kyi glang po ye shes rtog / thams cad thabs kyis 'gro ming dang //
T02TD1998E:198a-32: rgya mtsho'i blo gros legs par gzhag / blo gros mi zad bsgom par bya //
T02TD1998E:198a-33: bdud rtsi 'od dang brgyad gzhag go //
T02TD1998E:198a-34: shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru //
T02TD1998E:198a-35: rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje zhags //
T02TD1998E:198a-36: rdo rje lcags sgrog rdo rje dril //
T02TD1998E:198a-37: rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya //
T02TD1998E:198a-38: me la sogs pa'i grva ru yang //
T02TD1998E:198a-39: rdo rje gnod mdzes gtsug tor dang //
T02TD1998E:198a-40: rdo rje h'um mdzad de bzhin du //
T02TD1998E:198a-41: rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o ;
T02TD1998E:198a-42: / shar gyi phyogs pa thams cad gnag / de bzhin lho ba thams cad ser //
T02TD1998E:198a-43: mun pa thams cad dmar po yin //
T02TD1998E:198a-44: byang ni thams cad ljang gu yin //
T02TD1998E:198a-45: 'di dag sa bon yi ge ni //
T02TD1998E:198a-47: sam ram dham kam / bam kham mem mam /
T02TD1998E:198b-2: sam s'am aam aam aam pram spom gham /
T02TD1998E:198b-3: sum aum h'um aa zhes pa'o //
T02TD1998E:198b-4: de nas yi ge aa sogs ni //
T02TD1998E:198b-5: yi ge ha yi mthar thug pa //
T02TD1998E:198b-6: 'di dag thams cad yongs gyur las //
T02TD1998E:198b-7: gong gi lha ru rnam bsam bya //
T02TD1998E:198b-8: yang ni de bzhin kun la yang //
T02TD1998E:198b-9: yi ge aa las nyi dkyil 'khor //
T02TD1998E:198b-10: de bzhin nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las //
T02TD1998E:198b-12: phyogs bcu kun du bzhugs pa yi //
T02TD1998E:198b-13: de bzhin gshegs dag yang dag bskul //
T02TD1998E:198b-14: thams cad dgyes byas slar yang ni //
T02TD1998E:198b-15: bsdus nas nyi ma dag la thim //
T02TD1998E:198b-16: de la zhugs pa brtan par bsgom //
T02TD1998E:198b-17: rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsal //
T02TD1998E:198b-18: de yis rang bzhin dag pa'i ming //
T02TD1998E:198b-20: de la yang ni 'jam dpal sogs //
T02TD1998E:198b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs kun //
T02TD1998E:198b-22: gtso la bskor nas lhan cig tu //
T02TD1998E:198b-23: de bzhin du ni thim nas kyang //
T02TD1998E:198b-24: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du bsam bya //
T02TD1998E:198b-26: de yi dkyil du gtso sogs kyi //
T02TD1998E:198b-27: sa bon yi ge rnam bsam bya //
T02TD1998E:198b-28: yi ge h'um ni gtso bo sbyin //
T02TD1998E:198b-29: snying po thams cad nyi ma la //
T02TD1998E:198b-30: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na /
T02TD1998E:198b-31: gti mug sogs kyi dkyil 'khor lo //
T02TD1998E:198b-32: yakshe yatstsha ni r'a ma ya /
T02TD1998E:198b-33: shar du yang dag bsam par bya //
T02TD1998E:198b-34: ya ma r'a dza sa do me ya //
T02TD1998E:198b-35: de bzhin lho yi phyogs su gnas //
T02TD1998E:198b-36: ya me do ru na yo da ya /
T02TD1998E:198b-37: nub phyogs snam bu la ni sbyin //
T02TD1998E:198b-38: ya da yo ni ra ya kshe ya /
T02TD1998E:198b-39: byang du lha de gzhag par bya //
T02TD1998E:198b-40: yang m'anta ka sgo bzhi ru //
T02TD1998E:198b-41: shar la sogs pa rnam bsam bya //
T02TD1998E:198b-42: aom aom aom aom me la sogs pa'i grva bzhi ru //
T02TD1998E:198b-43: thams cad 'od zer lnga rang bzhin //
T02TD1998E:198b-44: dbus sogs shar phyogs dkr po yin /
T02TD1998E:198b-45: ser po dmar ljang gu'i mdog / lho dang nub dang byang yin no //
T02TD1998E:198b-46: de bzhin thams cad 'od zer ni //
T02TD1998E:198b-47: rnam par 'phro bar bsam par bya //
T02TD1998E:198b-48: sngon brjod de bzhin gshegs la sogs //
T02TD1998E:198b-49: slar yang bsdus nas gzhug par bya //
T02TD1998E:198b-50: dbus kyi yi ge las khro bo'o //
T02TD1998E:198b-51: rdo rje chen po kha dog gnag /'od zer 'gyed par rnam bsam bya //
T02TD1998E:198b-52: de bzhin rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs //
T02TD1998E:198b-53: sangs rgyas byang chub sems khro bo //
T02TD1998E:198b-54: rig pa'i lha mo nam mkha'i steng //
T02TD1998E:198b-55: til gyi gang bu bzhin gang bar //
T02TD1998E:199a-0: @199a * // gnas par bsam par bya ba yin //
T02TD1998E:199a-1: de bzhin sangs rgyas la sogs pas //
T02TD1998E:199a-2: sems can yongs su smin par yang //
T02TD1998E:199a-3: btul nas byang chub la gzhag ste //
T02TD1998E:199a-4: yang bsdus 'ongs te rdo rje la //
T02TD1998E:199a-5: thim par rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1998E:199a-7: / sngon du brjod pa'i mgo sogs brgya //
T02TD1998E:199a-8: 'od ltar kha dog khyad par sbyar //
T02TD1998E:199a-9: 'od zer rang bzhin rnam bsam bya //
T02TD1998E:199a-10: so so rigs kyi lha bzhin du //
T02TD1998E:199a-11: nam mkha'i steng du gnas pa ni //
T02TD1998E:199a-12: til gyi gang bu bzhin nyi ma'i //
T02TD1998E:199a-13: gdan la mngon par gnas par bsgom //
T02TD1998E:199a-14: de yis 'gro don byas na yang //
T02TD1998E:199a-15: 'ongs nas rang la gzhug par bya //
T02TD1998E:199a-16: slar yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1998E:199a-17: thams cad 'og tu rang gnas su //
T02TD1998E:199a-18: rang mtshan lhan cig yongs su gyur //
T02TD1998E:199a-19: gtso bo la ni bskor nas gnas //
T02TD1998E:199a-20: myur ba nyid du sku ru rdzogs //
T02TD1998E:199a-21: hr'i: shtri: brjod pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD1998E:199a-22: gtso bo bstan pa de bzhin 'dir //
T02TD1998E:199a-23: sgrub pa pos ni de bzhin bsgom //
T02TD1998E:199a-24: de ni rdo rje yi ni gzugs //
T02TD1998E:199a-25: zhal dgu pa ni rtag tu drag / ma he yi ni gzugs can te //
T02TD1998E:199a-27: thams cad drag po'i bdag nyid gzugs //
T02TD1998E:199a-28: dpal chen rdo rje 'jigs byed do //
T02TD1998E:199a-29: khams gsum po ni za bar nus //
T02TD1998E:199a-30: rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal bgrad pa //
T02TD1998E:199a-31: ljags 'dril ba ni gzi brjid che //
T02TD1998E:199a-32: rdo rje me dang mnyam par 'phro //
T02TD1998E:199a-33: rnam par gtsigs pa drag por gtsigs //
T02TD1998E:199a-34: khro gnyer zhal bgrad smin bgreng spyan //
T02TD1998E:199a-35: 'jig pa chen po'i dus dang mnyam //
T02TD1998E:199a-36: 'brug gi sgra dang rtag tu mtshungs //
T02TD1998E:199a-37: mi yi khrag dang rkang dang zhag / tshil bu klad pa za rang bzhin //
T02TD1998E:199a-39: lha la bsdigs par byed pa'i gtso //
T02TD1998E:199a-40: brgya byin tshangs dbang bishnu dang //
T02TD1998E:199a-41: gzhon nu bi n'a ya ka sogs //
T02TD1998E:199a-42: thams cad yang ni gsol bar byed //
T02TD1998E:199a-43: thod pa yis ni thod du byas //
T02TD1998E:199a-44: lha la 'jigs pa chen por byed //
T02TD1998E:199a-45: phem gyi sgra ni sgrogs pa yin //
T02TD1998E:199a-46: shin tu khros pa yi ni gzugs //
T02TD1998E:199a-48: kham pa shin tu yang dag brdzes //
T02TD1998E:199a-49: gcer bu zhabs ni bcu drug ste //
T02TD1998E:199a-50: g-yon pa'i zhabs kun brkyang ba yin //
T02TD1998E:199b-0: 'dar zhing @199b g-yo bar yang dag sbyor //
T02TD1998E:199b-1: 'jigs pa chen po yi ni sku //
T02TD1998E:199b-2: thams cad 'bar ba gyen du brdzes //
T02TD1998E:199b-3: phyag ni sum cu rtsa bzhi ste //
T02TD1998E:199b-4: gnyis kyis glang po'i pags rlon 'dzin //
T02TD1998E:199b-5: g-yas kyi dang po gri gug 'chang //
T02TD1998E:199b-6: gnyis pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa //
T02TD1998E:199b-7: gsum pa gtun shing de bzhin no //
T02TD1998E:199b-8: bzhi pa lnga pa drug pa ni //
T02TD1998E:199b-9: chu gri rtse gcig sta re'o //
T02TD1998E:199b-10: bdun pa mdud rtse brgyad pa na //
T02TD1998E:199b-11: mda' ste dgu pa lcags kyu'o //
T02TD1998E:199b-12: de bzhin bcu pa dbyug to'o //
T02TD1998E:199b-13: bcu gcig pa na kha tr'am ga / de bzhin bcu gnyis 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1998E:199b-14: bcu gsum pa ni rdo rje ste //
T02TD1998E:199b-15: bcu bzhi pa na tho ba'o //
T02TD1998E:199b-16: bco lnga pa na ral gri ste ;
T02TD1998E:199b-17: / bcu drug pa na rde'u chung ngo //
T02TD1998E:199b-18: g-yon pa'i dang po thod pa ste //
T02TD1998E:199b-19: gnyis pa na ni mgo bo'o //
T02TD1998E:199b-20: gsum pa phub ste bzhi pa rkang //
T02TD1998E:199b-21: lnga pa de bzhin zhags pa'o //
T02TD1998E:199b-22: drug pa gzhu ste bdun rgyu ma //
T02TD1998E:199b-23: brgyad pa dril bu dgu ni lag / bcu pa na ni dur khrod ras //
T02TD1998E:199b-24: bcu gcig skyes bu gsal shing btsugs //
T02TD1998E:199b-25: bcu gnyis pa na me thab bo //
T02TD1998E:199b-26: bcu gsum pa na thod tshal te //
T02TD1998E:199b-27: bcu bzhi pa na sdigs mdzub bo //
T02TD1998E:199b-28: bco lnga pa na 'phan rtse gsum //
T02TD1998E:199b-29: bcu drug pa na rlung gi ras //
T02TD1998E:199b-30: rim bzhin bsgom ste gzhan yang ni //
T02TD1998E:199b-31: g-yas kyi rkang pa dang pos ni //
T02TD1998E:199b-32: gnyis pa yi ni ma he'o ;
T02TD1998E:199b-33: / gsum pa yis ni ba lang ste //
T02TD1998E:199b-34: bzhi pas de bzhin bong bu'o //
T02TD1998E:199b-35: lnga bas rnga mo drug pas khyi //
T02TD1998E:199b-36: bdun pas lug ste brgyad spyang ki / g-yas kyi rkang pas de dag zhon //
T02TD1998E:199b-37: g-yon gyi rkang pa dang po yis //
T02TD1998E:199b-39: gsum pas bya rog bzhi pas seng //
T02TD1998E:199b-40: lnga khyung ste drug pas khra //
T02TD1998E:199b-41: de bzhin bdun pas ri skegs te //
T02TD1998E:199b-42: brgyad pa yis ni bzhad yin no //
T02TD1998E:199b-43: rim pa bzhin du zhon pa'o //
T02TD1998E:199b-44: dpal chen rdo rje 'jigs byed zhal //
T02TD1998E:199b-45: dang po ma he'i gdong pa ste //
T02TD1998E:199b-46: nag po khro ba g-yas pa yi //
T02TD1998E:199b-47: rva rtsa na ni zhal gsum ste //
T02TD1998E:199b-48: g-yas kyi dang po'i zhal ni sngo //
T02TD1998E:199b-49: de yi g-yas dmar ser po dang //
T02TD1998E:199b-50: g-yon pa'i rva rtsa'i zhal gsum ni //
T02TD1998E:199b-51: dkar dang dud ka nag po'o //
T02TD1998E:199b-52: thams cad shin tu khros pa ste //
T02TD1998E:199b-53: zhal gtsigs par ni rnam par bsam //
T02TD1998E:199b-54: rva gnyis kyi ni dbus ma'i zhal //
T02TD1998E:199b-55: brgyad pa yin te dmar po'o //
T02TD1998E:200a-2: shin tu de bzhin bsgom par bya //
T02TD1998E:200a-3: de yi steng du kun bzang gi / zhal ni cung zad ser ba'o //
T02TD1998E:200a-4: cung zad tsam ni khro ba'i gzugs //
T02TD1998E:200a-5: gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD1998E:200a-6: gtsug phud lnga yi rtse mo can //
T02TD1998E:200a-7: dgu pa yin te dus kun du'o //
T02TD1998E:200a-8: zhal rnams thams cad spyan gsum par //
T02TD1998E:200a-9: bdag nyid de bzhin bsgom par bya //
T02TD1998E:200a-10: 'khor gyi tshul rnams thams cad kyi //
T02TD1998E:200a-11: ming dang gzugs la sogs pa brjod //
T02TD1998E:200a-12: shar gyi ming ni rdo rje mgo //
T02TD1998E:200a-13: lho yi rdo rje lag pa'o //
T02TD1998E:200a-14: nub kyi rdo rje rgyu ma ste //
T02TD1998E:200a-15: byang ni rdo rje rkang pa'o //
T02TD1998E:200a-16: me grva'i rdo rje thod pa mo //
T02TD1998E:200a-17: bden bral rdo rje thod tshal ma //
T02TD1998E:200a-18: rlung du dur khrod ras ma'o //
T02TD1998E:200a-19: dbang ldan mdung rtser bskyon pa'o //
T02TD1998E:200a-20: phyi rim shar phyogs snam bu la //
T02TD1998E:200a-21: de bzhin rim par bsgom bya ba //
T02TD1998E:200a-22: rdo rje gri dang rdo rtse gcig / de bzhin rdo rje gtun shing dang //
T02TD1998E:200a-23: rdo rje chu gri mtshon rtse gcig / rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gzhan //
T02TD1998E:200a-24: rdo rje ma he rdo rje ba /
T02TD1998E:200a-25: shar na gnas pa brgyad kyi'o //
T02TD1998E:200a-26: snam bu dang por shes par bya //
T02TD1998E:200a-27: lho yi rdo rje sta re dang //
T02TD1998E:200a-28: rdo rje mda' dang rdo rje dbyug / rdo rje kha tv'am de bzhin te //
T02TD1998E:200a-29: rdo rje 'khor lo rdo rje zhags //
T02TD1998E:200a-30: de bzhin rdo rje phag pa yang //
T02TD1998E:200a-31: rdo rje bong bu brgyad pa'o //
T02TD1998E:200a-32: nub tu rdo rje rdo rde'u //
T02TD1998E:200a-33: rdo rje phub dang rdo rje gzhu //
T02TD1998E:200a-34: rdo rje dril bu de nas yang //
T02TD1998E:200a-35: rdo rje rlung gi ras yin no //
T02TD1998E:200a-36: de bzhin rdo rje rnga mor shes //
T02TD1998E:200a-37: rdo rje khyi ni brgyad pa'o //
T02TD1998E:200a-38: byang gi rdo rje sdigs mdzub dang //
T02TD1998E:200a-39: rdo rje 'phan rtse gsum pa dang //
T02TD1998E:200a-40: rdo rje glang pags rdo tho ba //
T02TD1998E:200a-41: rdo rje mdung dang rdor me thab //
T02TD1998E:200a-42: rdo rje lug ni de bzhin te //
T02TD1998E:200a-43: rdo rje spyang gi brgyad pa'o //
T02TD1998E:200a-44: gnas bzhi ru ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1998E:200a-45: shar sgo skyong ba bya rgod do //
T02TD1998E:200a-46: lho yi skyong ba 'ug pa ste //
T02TD1998E:200a-47: nub kyi skyong bar bya rog go //
T02TD1998E:200a-48: byang gi skyong ba seng yin no //
T02TD1998E:200a-49: me grvar khyung ni legs par gzhag / bden bral gyi ni khra yin no //
T02TD1998E:200a-50: de bzhin rlung gi ri skegs bsrung //
T02TD1998E:200a-51: dbang ldan bsrung ba bzhad yin no //
T02TD1998E:200a-52: ming gi thog ma kun rdo rje //
T02TD1998E:200a-53: dang po gzugs mdog nag por brjod //
T02TD1998E:200a-54: de rnams kha dog gcig yin te //
T02TD1998E:200a-55: phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa'o //
T02TD1998E:200a-56: rang gi ming bzhin phyag mtshan 'dzin //
T02TD1998E:200a-57: g-yas bskum zhabs kyis brtan par bzhugs //
T02TD1998E:200b-0: @200b thams cad ro yi gdan la bzhugs //
T02TD1998E:200b-1: spyan gsum pa ni cher drag pa //
T02TD1998E:200b-3: thams cad thod pas brgyan pa ste //
T02TD1998E:200b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta //
T02TD1998E:200b-5: cher 'khrugs pa ni bzhad pa'i zhal //
T02TD1998E:200b-6: zhal nas phem gyi sgra sgrogs 'phro //
T02TD1998E:200b-7: bcom ldan de bzhin thams cad kyang //
T02TD1998E:200b-8: de bzhin gcer bu mtshan gyen 'greng //
T02TD1998E:200b-9: lha rnams thams cad la mtshungs par //
T02TD1998E:200b-10: rang gi sa bon snying gar dgod //
T02TD1998E:200b-12: ye shes 'khor lo spyan drang ngo //
T02TD1998E:200b-13: dza: h'um bam ho:'i yi ges dgug / gzhug dang bcing dang mnyes par bya ;
T02TD1998E:200b-14: / sngags pa yang ni gcig pu ni //
T02TD1998E:200b-15: dbang bskur ba yang bsgom par bya //
T02TD1998E:200b-16: mchod pa sna tshogs mchod par bya //
T02TD1998E:200b-17: bdag gis thams cad bstod par bya //
T02TD1998E:200b-18: mi yi sha la sogs pa dang //
T02TD1998E:200b-19: khrag gis kyang ni mchod par bya //
T02TD1998E:200b-22: drag po'i las kyi don du ni //
T02TD1998E:200b-23: sngags bzlas de bzhin dran par bya //
T02TD1998E:200b-24: brnyas pa'i sems can gdul bar bya //
T02TD1998E:200b-25: thams cad rjes su mthun par bya //
T02TD1998E:200b-26: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um phat /
T02TD1998E:200b-27: ces pa nye ba'i snying po'i sngags //
T02TD1998E:200b-28: aom ya m'anta ka h'um phat /
T02TD1998E:200b-29: ces pa yang ni snying po'i sngags //
T02TD1998E:200b-30: aom ya ma r'a dza sa do me ya /
T02TD1998E:200b-31: ya me do ru na yo da ya //
T02TD1998E:200b-32: ya da yo ni ra ya kshe ya /
T02TD1998E:200b-33: yakshe yatstsha ni r'a ma ya h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1998E:200b-34: zhes pa dag ni rtsa sngags so //
T02TD1998E:200b-36: sngags bzlas par ni de bzhin bya //
T02TD1998E:200b-37: yi ge 'bar bar bsgoms pa yis ;
T02TD1998E:200b-38: / dngos grub dag ni myur ba yin //
T02TD1998E:200b-39: thams cad la ni dbang bsgyur bar //
T02TD1998E:200b-40: snying gar nyi ma rnam bsam bya //
T02TD1998E:200b-41: thams cad kyis ni 'khor bar yang //
T02TD1998E:200b-42: ma he'i gdong gi snying gar dgod //
T02TD1998E:200b-43: snying po'i sngags sogs dang por ni //
T02TD1998E:200b-44: sngags gsum bzlas pa yang dag sbyar //
T02TD1998E:200b-45: de bzhin sngags ni so sor bzlas //
T02TD1998E:200b-46: sgrub pa pos ni gang 'dod bya //
T02TD1998E:200b-47: snying po la sogs brtan gnas pa //
T02TD1998E:200b-48: lha rnams la yang de bzhin dgod //
T02TD1998E:200b-49: sha rnams thams cad za ba na //
T02TD1998E:200b-50: dang por ma he'i gdong la dbul //
T02TD1998E:200b-51: gtor ma 'byung po thams cad la //
T02TD1998E:200b-52: sngags bzlas pas ni sbyin par bya //
T02TD1998E:201a-1: ya p'a t'a la tsa r'a ya /
T02TD1998E:201a-3: ta p'u rba ni g'a nam /
T02TD1998E:201a-4: ka dakshi na d'i g'a y'a /
T02TD1998E:201a-6: phat autta ra dh'i g'a ya /
T02TD1998E:201a-7: aom hr'i: yashtri: p'a wi kshi kri ko //
T02TD1998E:201a-9: h'um bhyo phat sarba bh'u te bhya: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byin brlab bya //
T02TD1998E:201a-10: brtan pa ru ni bsgom pa yis //
T02TD1998E:201a-11: 'di yis thams cad rdzogs par bya //
T02TD1998E:201a-12: ting nge 'dzin ni bsgrub pa'i ming //
T02TD1998E:201a-13: sgrib pa thams cad sel ba'o //
T02TD1998E:201a-14: dus gsum du ni de ltar bsgrub //
T02TD1998E:201a-15: rgyun du brtan par bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1998E:201a-16: thams cad las ni gang byed pa //
T02TD1998E:201a-17: bdag nyid ma he'i zhal gyis so //
T02TD1998E:201a-18: ting 'dzin gsum ni sems kyis bya //
T02TD1998E:201a-20: sems can mthun dang mi mthun dag / yid kyis bya ba rab tu bya //
T02TD1998E:201a-21: bdag gis byang chub tu rab gdul //
T02TD1998E:201a-22: sems can mnyam par yang dag byung //
T02TD1998E:201a-23: dam pa'i don du rnam dag pa //
T02TD1998E:201a-24: dus ni dpa' bo chen po'i gzugs //
T02TD1998E:201a-25: zhal brgyad thun tshod brgyad yin no ;
T02TD1998E:201a-26: / zhal dgu thun tshod spyi yin no //
T02TD1998E:201a-27: phyag dang zhabs gnyis zla ba dang //
T02TD1998E:201a-28: zla ba phyed dang yang dag sbyor //
T02TD1998E:201a-29: bzhon pa bcu drug dus dang ni //
T02TD1998E:201a-30: zla ba yi ni zhag tu shes //
T02TD1998E:201a-31: zhal ni gza' dgu dag tu shes //
T02TD1998E:201a-32: phyag ni rgyu skar dag dang sbyar //
T02TD1998E:201a-33: zhabs ni 'pho ba bcu gnyis dang //
T02TD1998E:201a-34: dus bzhi yang ni de bzhin no //
T02TD1998E:201a-35: mtshon cha rnams ni stong pa dang //
T02TD1998E:201a-36: snying rje dag ni bcu drug gnyis //
T02TD1998E:201a-37: glang chen pags pa bgegs chen te //
T02TD1998E:201a-38: drag po'i gzugs ni sdug bsngal che //
T02TD1998E:201a-39: sel bar byed pa'i gtso bo'o //
T02TD1998E:201a-40: kha dog nag po byams pa che //
T02TD1998E:201a-41: thod pa'i rgyan ni mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1998E:201a-42: dkyil 'khor lha ni thams cad dag / rang bzhin 'byung ba'i dus dag go //
T02TD1998E:201a-43: sngags gsum dag pa sku gsum mo //
T02TD1998E:201a-44: lha rnams nyid ni rang ming ni //
T02TD1998E:201a-45: dang por aom dang h'um phat mtha' //
T02TD1998E:201a-46: thod par btung ba'i dus dag go //
T02TD1998E:201a-47: dkyil 'khor byang chub phyogs yin no //
T02TD1998E:201a-48: zhon pas ri santi ka / mdog sogs de bzhin gshegs pa ste //
T02TD1998E:201a-49: dag pa thams cad shes pa'o //
T02TD1998E:201a-50: 'di ni dag pa cung zad tsam //
T02TD1998E:201a-51: 'jam dpal rgyud na rgyas pa yin //
T02TD1998E:201a-52: bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di byas pas //
T02TD1998E:201a-53: bsod nams de ni gang rnyed pa //
T02TD1998E:201b-0: de yis 'jig rten bsod nams shog / bdag gi sdug bsngal bral gyur @201b cig ;
T02TD1998E:201b-1: dpal gyi sgrub thabs 'di bsdus pa //
T02TD1998E:201b-2: rdo rje 'jigs byed rtog pa ni //
T02TD1998E:201b-3: sum brgya pa ste 'jam dpal gyi //
T02TD1998E:201b-4: rgyud las cung zad tsam zhig phyung //
T02TD1998E:201b-5: ma tshang lhag pa gang yin pa //
T02TD1998E:201b-6: bdag la legs par bzod par mdzod //
T02TD1998E:201b-7: sngon du bdag gis gang las mthong //
T02TD1998E:201b-8: de ni mnyes par bya ba tsam //
T02TD1998E:201b-9: dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon la li ta badzra'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1998E:201b-11: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradzny'a shr'i de ba dang /
T02TD1998E:201b-12: bod kyi lo ts'a ba cog gru bande shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
